comment: Express the property " ` F ` is a Cauchy sequence of metric ` D ` ". Part of Definition 1.4-3 of [Kreyszig] p. 28. The condition ` F C_ ( CC X. X ) ` allows us to use objects more general than sequences when convenient; see the comment in ~ df-lm . (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2013.)
